channel.title: UI Kit Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest UI Kit news and events.

item.title: Beggining of layout work
item.description: Second week of my intership started with making functions for flex content in SASS. This functions allow to create dynamically classes for changing grid size of an element. I've created also Demo Page, which presents this functionality.

item.title: Work on Typography has been finished
item.description: By the first week of my intership I was working on typography functions in SASS. This functions let fonts to change its sizes dynamically, depending on screen resolution.

item.title: Intership has started
item.description: This is was the first day of my holiday intership. I met with Denys and we decided to start developing our UI Kit.
